mainwindow.cpp
1 #include "../Headers/mainwindow.h"
2 #include "../Headers/drawpath.h"
3 
4 #include <ui_mainwindow.h>
5 
6 using namespace std;
7 
8 /* Constructors and Destructors */
9 /*****************************************************************/
10 /*****************************************************************/
11 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent) :
12  QMainWindow(parent),
13  ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
14 {
15  ui->setupUi(this);
16 
17  // Install event filter
18  qApp->installEventFilter(this);
19 
20  // Open data file in truncated mode
21  ifstream myFile(DATA_FILE.c_str() , std::ios::ate);
22 
23  // If the file is empty
24  if((int)(myFile.tellg()) == 0)
25  {
26  // Holds user dialog response
27  bool ok;
28 
29  // Loop while the user rejects the dialog
30  do
31  {
32  // Get user input and store into number
33  int number = QInputDialog::getInt(this, tr("Alert:"),
34  tr("Enter your team number:"), 0000, 0, 99999, 0, &ok);
35 
36  // If the user accepts the dialog
37  if(ok)
38  {
39  // Create a new Team object with a number of the user input
40  Team defaultTeam(number);
41 
42  // Save changes to file
43  defaultTeam.writeToFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
44  }
45  }while(!ok);
46  }
47 
48  // Create a new image
49  field = new QImage(FIELD_IMAGE.c_str());
50  // Create a new pixmap from the image
51  item = new QPixmap(QPixmap::fromImage(*field));
52  // Draws scene
53  drawField();
54 
55  // Updates allTeams vector
56  on_refreshTeamListButton_clicked();
57 
58  // Sets current team to your team
59  currentTeamIndex = 0;
60 
61  // Updates UI to show your team's details
62  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
63 }
64 
65 // Destructor
66 MainWindow::~MainWindow()
67 {
68  delete ui;
69 }
70

72 
73 
74 
75 /* Member Functions */
76 /*****************************************************************/
77 /*****************************************************************/
78 void MainWindow::drawField()
79 {
80  delete scene;
81  scene = new DrawPath();
82 
83  connect(scene , SIGNAL(userHasDrawn()) , this , SLOT(enableAddButton()));
84 
85  scene->addPixmap(*item);
86  ui->autonomousPlan->setScene(scene);
87 
88  return;
89 }
90 
91 void MainWindow::drawAutoPath(int teamIndex, int autoIndex , QString color)
92 {
93  const int drawRadius = 3;
94 
95  QPen myPen;
96 
97  myPen.setColor(color);
98 
99 
100  for(int i = 0; i < allTeams[teamIndex].getSinglePath(autoIndex).size(); i ++)
101  {
102  scene->addEllipse(allTeams[teamIndex].getSinglePath(autoIndex)[i].x()
103  , allTeams[teamIndex].getSinglePath(autoIndex)[i].y()
104  , drawRadius * 2.0 , drawRadius * 2.0 , myPen , QBrush(Qt::SolidPattern));
105  }
106 
107  return;
108 }
109 
110 void MainWindow::addTeam(Team team)
111 {
112  allTeams.push_back(team);
113 
114  return;
115 }
116 
117 void MainWindow::updateFile(QString filename)
118 {
119  // Delete file so we don't append to it or leave leftover information
120  // Fixme... There's a better way to do this
121  remove(DATA_FILE.c_str());
122 
123  // Write each team to the file
124  for(int i = 0; i < allTeams.size(); i ++)
125  {
126  allTeams[i].writeToFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
127  }
128 
129  return;
130 }
131 
132 void MainWindow::refreshUI(int teamIndex)
133 {
134  // Resets scene
135  drawField();
136 
137  // Enable or disable delete team button
138  if(teamIndex == 0)
139  ui->deleteTeamButton->setEnabled(false);
140  else
141  ui->deleteTeamButton->setEnabled(true);
142 
143  // Data field edit
144  ui->nameEditEdit->setText(QString::fromStdString(allTeams[teamIndex].getName()));
145  ui->placeEditEdit->setText(QString::number(allTeams[teamIndex].getPlace()));
146 
147  ui->teleOpEdit1->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getTeleOpElement(0));
148  ui->teleOpEdit2->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getTeleOpElement(1));
149  ui->teleOpEdit3->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getTeleOpElement(2));
150 
151  ui->autoEdit1->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getAutoElement(0));
152  ui->autoEdit2->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getAutoElement(1));
153  ui->autoEdit3->setChecked(allTeams[teamIndex].getAutoElement(2));
154 
155  ui->otherEditEdit->setText(QString::fromStdString(allTeams[teamIndex].getOther()));
156 
157  // Reset tabs
158  ui->drawModeTabs->setCurrentIndex(0);
159 
160  // If the current team isn't yours, then show the Compatible checkbox
161  if(currentTeamIndex == 0)
162  ui->isCompatible->hide();
163  else
164  ui->isCompatible->show();
165 
166  // Reset comboboxes
167  ui->yourTeamAutos->clear();
168  ui->theirTeamAutos->clear();
169  ui->pathsBox->clear();
170 
171  // Reset Paths combobox
172  ui->pathsBox->addItem("New");
173  for(int i = 0; i < allTeams[teamIndex].getPaths().size(); i ++)
174  {
175  ui->pathsBox->addItem(QString::number(i + 1));
176  }
177 
178  // Reset Your Team Autos combobox
179  ui->yourTeamAutos->addItem("Team " + QString::number(allTeams[0].getNumber()));
180  for(int i = 0; i < allTeams[0].getPaths().size(); i ++)
181  {
182  ui->yourTeamAutos->addItem(QString::number(i + 1));
183  }
184 
185  // Reset Their Team Autos combobox
186  ui->theirTeamAutos->addItem("Team " + QString::number(allTeams[teamIndex].getNumber()));
187  for(int i = 0; i < allTeams[teamIndex].getPaths().size(); i ++)
188  {
189  ui->theirTeamAutos->addItem(QString::number(i + 1));
190  }
191 
192  return;
193 }
194 
195 
196 
197 
198 
199 /* Event Filter */
200 /*****************************************************************/
201 /*****************************************************************/
202 bool MainWindow::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event)
203 {
204  // If the Other text edit goes out of focus, update Team and write to file
205  if(obj == ui->otherEditEdit && event->type() == QEvent::FocusOut)
206  {
207  allTeams[currentTeamIndex].setOther(ui->otherEditEdit->toPlainText().toStdString());
208  updateFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
209  }
210 
211  return false;
212 }

215 
216 
217 
218 /* Slots */
219 /*****************************************************************/
220 /*****************************************************************/
221 // Team List
222 void MainWindow::on_addButton_clicked()
223 {
224  // Result of the new team dialog
225  bool ok;
226 
227  // Create a dialog asking for team number
228  int number = QInputDialog::getInt(this, tr("New Team"),
229  tr("Enter the team number:"), 0000, 0, 99999, 0, &ok);
230 
231  // If the user decides to create a new team
232  if(ok)
233  {
234  // Create new Team object with number as user input
235  Team newTeam(number);
236 
237  // Append team to file
238  newTeam.writeToFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
239 
240  // That way, if the team number is duplicate, it will be discarded
241  // when refreshed
242  on_refreshTeamListButton_clicked();
243 
244  // Set team list selection on the last element in the list
245  ui->teamList->setCurrentRow(static_cast <int>(allTeams.size()) - 2);
246 
247  // Update current team to reflect element index
248  currentTeamIndex = ui->teamList->count();
249 
250  // Update UI to show team info
251  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
252  }
253 
254  return;
255 }
256 
257 void MainWindow::on_deleteTeamButton_clicked()
258 {
259  // Delete the team from the allTeams vector
260  allTeams.erase(allTeams.begin() + ui->teamList->currentRow() + 1);
261 
262  // Delete team from list widget
263  delete ui->teamList->currentItem();
264 
265  // Update file to reflect deletion
266  updateFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
267 
268  // If there's still stuff in the list
269  // Set the current team index to 1 less because
270  // the list will select the item directly preceding the deleted one
271  // If the list is empty, default team is selected
272  if(ui->teamList->count() > 0)
273  currentTeamIndex --;
274 
275  // Refresh UI to see team details
276  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
277 
278  return;
279 }
280 
281 void MainWindow::on_refreshTeamListButton_clicked()
282 {
283  Team* newTeam = new Team();
284 
285  // Number of duplicates encountered
286  int numDupes = 0;
287 
288  // Start i from allTeams size because allTeams may already have elements
289  for(int i = static_cast <int>(allTeams.size()); newTeam->readFromFile(DATA_FILE.c_str() , i , allTeams) != 0; i ++)
290  {
291  // If the i-th team is found and is not a duplicate, add Team to allTeams
292  if(newTeam->readFromFile(DATA_FILE.c_str() , i , allTeams) == 1)
293  {
294  addTeam(*newTeam);
295 
296  // If Team is not the first Team, then add to the list widget
297  if(i != 0)
298  ui->teamList->addItem(QString::number(allTeams[i - numDupes].getNumber()));
299  }
300  // If the i-th team is a duplicate, then ignore and add one to the number of duplicates
301  else if(newTeam->readFromFile(DATA_FILE.c_str() , i , allTeams) == 2)
302  numDupes ++;
303 
304  // Delete object and create a new one
305  delete newTeam;
306  newTeam = new Team();
307  }
308 
309  // Delete object before leaving scope
310  delete newTeam;
311 
312  return;
313 }
314 
315 void MainWindow::on_yourTeamButton_clicked()
316 {
317  // Move focus out of list widget
318  ui->teamList->clearSelection();
319 
320  // Set auto compare to defaults
321  ui->yourTeamAutos->setCurrentIndex(0);
322  ui->theirTeamAutos->setCurrentIndex(0);
323 
324  // Set team index to that of your team
325  currentTeamIndex = 0;
326 
327  // Update UI to show your team details
328  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
329 
330  return;
331 }
332 
333 void MainWindow::on_teamList_itemClicked(QListWidgetItem *item)
334 {
335  // I don't need this, and I don't like compiler warnings
336  item = 0;
337 
338  // Switches to default so that attempts to render don't crash program
339  ui->yourTeamAutos->setCurrentIndex(0);
340  ui->theirTeamAutos->setCurrentIndex(0);
341 
342  // Get current row selected
343  int currentRow = ui->teamList->currentRow();
344 
345  // Add 1 because of the default team not being on the list
346  currentRow ++;
347 
348  // Set current team to the selected row plus 1
349  currentTeamIndex = currentRow;
350 
351  // Update UI to show team details
352  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
353 
354  return;
355 }

425 void MainWindow::on_addPath_clicked()
426 {

428  allTeams[currentTeamIndex].addToPathList(scene->getPath());
429 
430  // Update file
431  updateFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
432 
433  // Reset scene
434  drawField();
435 
436  // Disable the addPath button to avoid breaking data file
437  ui->addPath->setEnabled(false);
438 
439  // Reset UI
440  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
441 
442  return;
443 }

460 void MainWindow::on_removePathButton_clicked()
461 {
462  // Remove path from Team object
463  allTeams[currentTeamIndex].erasePath(ui->pathsBox->currentIndex() - 1);
464 
465  // Remove path from combobox
466  ui->pathsBox->removeItem(ui->pathsBox->currentIndex());
467 
468  // Update data file
469  updateFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
470 
471  // Update UI to reflect changes
472  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
473 
474  return;
475 }
476 
477 void MainWindow::on_removeAllPathsButton_clicked()
478 {
479  // Deletes all paths of current Team object
480  allTeams[currentTeamIndex].eraseAllPaths();
481 
482  // Clear all paths from combobox and add "New" element
483  ui->pathsBox->clear();
484  ui->pathsBox->addItem("New");
485 
486  // Update data file
487  updateFile(DATA_FILE.c_str());
488 
489  // Update UI to reflect changes
490  refreshUI(currentTeamIndex);
491 
492  return;
493 }
494 
495 void MainWindow::on_pathsBox_currentIndexChanged(int index)
496 {
497  // Reset scene
498  drawField();
499 
500  // If the selection is actually a path index
501  if(index > 0)
502  {
503  // Draw path, disallow drawing, and allow for removability of path
504  drawAutoPath(currentTeamIndex , index - 1 , "black");
505  scene->allowDraw = false;
506  ui->removePathButton->setEnabled(true);
507  }
508 
509  // Otherwise, don't allow path to be removed
510  else
511  ui->removePathButton->setEnabled(false);
512 
513  return;
514 }
515 
516 void MainWindow::on_yourTeamAutos_currentIndexChanged(int index)
517 {
518  // Refresh scene
519  drawField();
520 
521  // If your team's path is selected, draw in blue
522  if(index > 0)
523  drawAutoPath(0 , index - 1 , "blue");
524 
525  // If their team's path is selected, draw in red
526  if(ui->theirTeamAutos->currentIndex() > 0)
527  drawAutoPath(currentTeamIndex , ui->theirTeamAutos->currentIndex() - 1 , "red");
528 
529  return;
530 }
531 
532 void MainWindow::on_theirTeamAutos_currentIndexChanged(int index)
533 {
534  // Refresh scene
535  drawField();
536 
537  // If their team's path is selected, draw in red
538  if(index > 0)
539  drawAutoPath(currentTeamIndex , index - 1 , "red");
540 
541  // If your team's path is selected, draw in blue
542  if(ui->yourTeamAutos->currentIndex() > 0)
543  drawAutoPath(0 , ui->yourTeamAutos->currentIndex() - 1 , "blue");
544 
545  return;
546 }
547 
548 void MainWindow::on_drawModeTabs_currentChanged(int index)
549 {
550  // Refresh scene
551  drawField();
552 
553  // If the UI is in draw mode, allow drawing
554  if(index == 0)
555  scene->allowDraw = true;
556 
557  // If the UI is in compare mode, disallow drawing
558  else
559  scene->allowDraw = false;
560 
561  return;
562 }
